title: Phone thinks I'm in another state on autodetect on network?
content: Since daylight savings overnight this morning, my phone "fell back" by 2 hours instead of one. I finally figured out it's because it thinks I'm in Colorado/mountain time (I'm not) when I'm using the normal auto detection on network. Haven't tried wifi yet. I can manually set it back to central time but switching back to network it just keeps happening.
